Jane - This is a pretty late request, and for future releases we should avoid treating code freeze as = to when engagement requirements can come in. I'm also not sure where on the videos page this should go, or what the copy should be. There needs to be a title and a brief summary. Any suggestions are welcome here - Cc-ing Matej here too.

Hey Laura - believe me this wasn't in the plan.
We were looking for each video to be hosted on an individual page and would still like that to be the solution. It seems like we need to have them on the Videos in order to get them live.
If there is a way to get them hosted on a page which doesn't include the videos page, I'd be delighted to do that.
Let me know if you need descriptions for these videos from me. Shouldn't be a problem to get them done, just want to make sure they're needed.
thanks Matej. I've asked to chat with Laura and Grace in the morning to figure out where we go from here. Thanks for the offer of help.

Hey Guys -- we have a challenge hosting and getting the Installation videos live, therefore I'm going to take them out of this release, rather than jeopardize the launch.
We're going to make the following edits to the copy.
OLD COPY: Take them to school. Send a video that teaches them how to install Firefox 4 on their Mac or PC. Or send them PDF instructions for Mac or PC instead.
NEW COPY: Take them to school. Send a PDF guide that teaches them how to install Firefox 4 on their Mac or PC.
I'd still like to add the videos -- but not for this release.
resolving this for now and I added the copy above to bug#647730 for craig to make the changes. We can open a new bug for videos for a future release.
Hey guys, sorry I didn't see this before, it was a crazy couple of days. I'll be tracking this page more closely now.
